definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

pinyin: zhong1 gong4 zhong1 yang1 ji4 wei3 jian1 cha2 bu4

sentences.english: Who dares, and I compare? Who will win, who belongs to the Ministry of Supervision site.
sentences.chinese: 誰敢和我比？誰贏，監察部的地盤屬於誰。

sentences.english: To undertake other assignments as designated by the CPC Central Disciplinary Committee and Ministry of Supervision.
sentences.chinese: 承辦中央紀委監察部交辦的其他事項。

sentences.english: The dual investigation shall be conducted by the audit department and the supervision department according to their division of functions.
sentences.chinese: 一案雙查由稽查部門和監察部門按照職責分工實施。

sentences.english: After several tries, in 2008, his suggestion was passed to the Ministry of Supervision for investigation.
sentences.chinese: 經過多次努力，他的建議於2008年被轉給監察部。

sentences.english: The ministry says a total of 405 people held responsible last year alone have been punished.
sentences.chinese: 監察部稱，僅去年就有405名相關負責人受到懲處。

definition: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (CCDI), organization within the CCP which investigates corruption and other wrongdoing among Party cadres/abbr. for 中共中央紀律檢查委員會|中共中央纪律检查委员会
